original_title: Black Widow XXX: An Axel Braun Parody
overview: After a self-imposed yearlong COVID hiatus, parody master Axel Braun returns with another big-budget, action-packed, hysterically sexy spoof that is sure to remind everybody why he is the most awarded porn director in history. Starring 2020 Penthouse Pet of the Year Lacy Lennon in the titular role and featuring the typical better-than-Hollywood costumes, canon character portrayals and legendary attention to detail that Braun fans have come to expect and demand, BLACK WIDOW XXX is another monumental achievement in the body of work of the most bankable X-rated director in the business.
title: Black Widow XXX: An Axel Braun Parody
